question.body: Which protein is found in the thick filaments?

response.feedback: Correct. Bundled myosin groups form the thick filaments.
Incorrect. Actin is the central component of the thin filaments.
Incorrect. Titin is a large protein that maintains structural integrity of the sarcomere.
Incorrect. Tropomyosin binds to actin in the thin filaments.

part.hint: The thick filaments and thin filaments interact in the sarcomere.
The thin filaments are pulled by the thick filaments.
